fact: Fliegerführer Afrika was established on 24 February 1941 by Luftgau VII for Africa operations
original_text: Am 24. 2. 1941 durch Luftgau VII für Afrika errichtet
notes: Overall Luftwaffe air command for North Africa

fact: Fliegerführer Afrika was subordinate to X. Fliegerkorps in Athens
original_text: unterstand dem X. Fliegerkorps in Athen
notes: Reported through X. Fliegerkorps in Greece

fact: Fliegerführer Afrika worked in cooperation with the Deutsches Afrikakorps and Rommel's German-Italian Panzer Army
original_text: Zusammenarbeit mit dem Deutschen Afrikakorps und der Deutsch-italienischen Panzerarmee Rommels

fact: Jagdgeschwader 27 (JG 27) was established with Stab and I. Gruppe on 1 October 1939 in Münster-Handorf
original_text: Stab und I. Gruppe wurden am 1. 10. 1939 in Münster-Handorf aufgestellt

fact: JG 27 was equipped with Me 109 (Bf 109) fighters
I./JG 27 deployed to North Africa in April 1941 as the only German fighter group
source_citation: Tessin Band 14, Jagdgeschwader 27 section, 1941 Nordafrika entry
original_text: als einzige deutsche Jagdgruppe kam im April die I. Gruppe (Flugplatz Gazala) zum Deutschen Afrikakorps
notes: First German fighter unit in North Africa

fact: I./JG 27 was based at Flugplatz Gazala airfield in Libya
I./JG 27 fought in battles around Tobruk in Q2 1941
I./JG 27 was relieved by II./JG 27 in September 1941 (after Q2)
original_text: im Sept. abgelöst durch die auf 'trop' umgerüstete II. Gruppe
notes: II. Gruppe equipped with tropical modifications

fact: The entire JG 27 Geschwader (Stab, I.-III.) was united at Tmimi in December 1941 under Fliegerführer Afrika
original_text: Dez. das ganze Geschwader (Stab, 1.-III.) in Tmimi vereint (Fliegerführer Afrika)
notes: Full consolidation of JG 27 in North Africa by end of 1941

fact: Sturzkampfgeschwader 3 (StG 3) I. Gruppe was deployed to Greece in April 1941, not North Africa
original_text: 1941 Jan.: die I. Gruppe mit dem VIII. Fliegerkorps nach Rumänien, dann Einsatz Griechenland
notes: StG 3 was engaged in Balkans campaign, not Africa in Q2 1941

fact: StG 3 only deployed to North Africa starting in January 1942 (after Q2 1941)
original_text: 1942 Jan.: Stab und I. Gruppe, Juli Stab, I.-IIl. Gruppe im Einsatz bei Luftflotte 2 im Mittelmeerraum (Afrika)
notes: Clarifies StG 3 was NOT in North Africa during 1941-Q2

fact: Luftnachrichten-Abt. Afrika was established in 1941 with Fliegerführer Afrika
Luftnachrichten-Abt. Afrika formed Luftnachrichten-Inf.Btl. in December 1941 during battles for Benghazi
original_text: bildete Dez. 1941 das Luftnachrichten-Inf.Btl. während der Kämpfe um Benghasi
notes: Signals unit converted to infantry role
